USART_Word_Length

Defines

#define USART_WordLength_8b   ((uint16_t)0x0000)
#define USART_WordLength_9b   ((uint16_t)0x1000)
#define IS_USART_WORD_LENGTH(LENGTH)

#define IS_USART_WORD_LENGTH (   LENGTH  ) 
Value:
(((LENGTH) == USART_WordLength_8b) || \
                                      ((LENGTH) == USART_WordLength_9b))
